definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
in a mess/scattered about/in complete disorder
to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext/also written 借口[jie4 kou3]
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
to lie in total disorder/lying fallen over one another
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]

sentences.english: When Henrik and his German father become Nazis , the family had changed.
sentences.chinese: 当汉力克与他的德藉父亲参加纳粹后，家族变质。

sentences.english: With the results of staff appraisal, I understand my professional development needs.
sentences.chinese: 藉著考绩结果，我了解自己的专业发展需要。

sentences.english: You mean you intend to sneak home during work hours.
sentences.chinese: 你是说你打算藉公务之名，偷溜回家吗？

sentences.english: To serve God by serving others.
sentences.chinese: 藉著服侍其他人来事奉神。

sentences.english: He that sendeth a message by the hand of a fool cutteth off the feet, and drinketh damage.
sentences.chinese: 藉愚昧人手寄的，是砍断自己的脚，自受损害。

sentences.english: He pantomimed hunger by rubbing his belly and groaning.
sentences.chinese: 他藉著磨擦肚子和呻吟做势表示饿了。
藉时将会又是个“欢乐巴哥”会。

sentences.english: Christ administers His discipline through Spirit-filled men.
sentences.chinese: 基督藉著用圣灵充满的人，来管教信徒。

sentences.english: We have latent talents and dormant faculties, which are brought to light by exercise.
sentences.chinese: 我们蕴蓄着的天才和才能必须藉运用才发挥无余。

sentences.english: Ye were made dead to the law, through the body of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 你们藉著基督的身体向律法也是死的。

sentences.english: The sunlight was reflected in the water.
sentences.chinese: 月球是藉反射阳光而发光的。

sentences.english: Reclaim Nature's Blessings, Through BN's Products.
sentences.chinese: 盼藉著拜恩的产品，重享大自然的福分。

sentences.english: His bruise was a trick to play truant from school.
sentences.chinese: 他以瘀伤作为逃学的藉囗。

sentences.english: The word of the Lord to Israel by Malachi .
sentences.chinese: 耶和华藉玛拉基传给以色列的默示。

sentences.english: Politicians use the "right" making money, black and white confluence, Living and sharing interests.
sentences.chinese: 政治人物藉“权”捞钱，黑白合流，利益共生互享。

sentences.english: One way is through false doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 其中一种方法就是藉著错谬的教义。

definition: in order that/so that/so as to/to cause sth
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
to maintain/to adhere to/to observe (an injunction etc)
